attachments.title: eTown Live Streaming - eTown
attachments.text: Moon Conference Thursday, May 26 09:00 Doors Open 09:30 ten-minute meditation 09:45 Opening Remarks 10:00 “Well, Actually…” 10:30 Hacking Web Apps with Clojure(Script) @ Code for Denver 11:00 Break & conversations 11:30 Architecture, Front End and a Bit of Front-End Architecture 12:00 Tulip: A Well-Balanced Language 12:30 Lunch 02:00 loop while (“profit”) — Gambling, Software, …

text: At least you give people something to talk about on YouTube
Okay. Thanks! Thought it maybe cool for the video ;-)
<@U0D6EPESC>: might be a bit too much for your presentation, wear the suit the second day, Wu tang shirt and jacket for present
Other option is: wu-tang shirt and blue jacket
<@U0ARRNM3R>: maybe later. I'm not in my room right now
(You're right about the Dutch.)
What are the other options?
<@U0D6EPESC>: post a picture so that everyone can see
<!channel>: and, I don't want to be that guy all the time, but stick to English please! Can everyone help me out with this a bit.
<!channel>: can I wear my green adidas tracksuit to my presentation? Or is it too much?
<@U0D6EPESC>: ja leuk, ik blijf vandaag niet zo lang maar ben er morgen hele dag.
<@U19SW5FAR> mocht je het het leuk vinden, kan ik jullie aan elkaar voorstellen.

<@U19SW5FAR>: <@U0ARRNM3R> klopt Daniel is er, en de jongens van UncInc zijn er ook. Met hen heb ik samengewerkt aan het augmenting masterpieces project bij het rijksmuseum.  Goede interactie designers met wie we in de toekomst waarschijnlijk wel weer een keer zullen samenwerken.
<@U19SW5FAR>: ^^

Nee, wij zijn daar niet, maar Daniel (@webhat) is daar wel geloof ik. Hij is regelmatig betrokken bij Offcourse en werkt zelf bij Oplerno (<http://www.oplerno.com>). Jan Hein zelf is op Moonconf in Amerika. Veel plezier op TNW en hopelijk ook snel in het echt!

attachments.title: Home
attachments.text: Oplerno is an online global educational institution. We aim to maximize control, value, and efficiency in higher education for students and faculty.

text: Hi <@U0ARRNM3R> wat leuk! Ik nu op TNW trouwens, iemand van jullie nog hier toevallig vandaag of morgen? Succes daar!

<@U19SW5FAR>: Hoi Mariolein, toevallig! Ik ben nu op StartupFest in Den Haag en ontmoette Lidia (een vrouw uit Rusland, ze had het met jou o.a. over Brainify gehad) , zij kent jou van ImpactHub. Ik vertelde over Offcourse en ze noemde meteen jouw naam :smiley:
ooh la la, artsy pic :blush:

<!channel>: Please quote retweet (add something personal on what you added to the site or how you experienced working on the site to make sure your followers know you had something to do with it :slightly_smiling_face: )! <https://twitter.com/offcourse_/status/735568283068473344>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/offcourse_|@offcourse_>: We just launched our new website. Come take a look! <http://offcourse.io/> #education #edtech #entrepreneur <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CjVDc_dWgAAEzg-.jpg>

text: Are you sure it's not one of us? :joy:

<!channel>: :tropical_drink: cheers guys 'n girls, because we have our very first ever email subscriber! So who wants to volunteer to create the first 'collection' for our mailing? <@U17C0L2VA> we should start working on an email design
<@U1BLTT51T>: So good to have you and nice profile pic :slightly_smiling_face: Hopefully see you Wednesday xx
Yes I will check it tonight
<@U177W7XH8>! Let's see if we can find the fragment and tweet it!

You never believe what just happened.. I just got home and turned on the TV, then <@U0ARRNM3R> appeared super big on my screen for a few seconds hahaha! It was from the event that they filmed during our team meeting
:+1:  looks good
:stuck_out_tongue:
Friend is Peter fyi
Yes. They are in the markdown.
<@U0D6EPESC>: love your friend's quote :stuck_out_tongue:. All the quotes are very nice. I'm assuming you have lots of talking beside them :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U1BLTT51T>: if you time to look at it, your feedback would be greatly appreciated too <https://github.com/yeehaa123/presentation-moonconf/blob/master/slides.md>

text: Unfortunately I can't go, but Charlotte will represent us
<!channel>: What's the status on this event? Is anyone representing us in The Hague tomorrow?
<@U0CRWKV2T>: thnx. Still working on it. Especially the end.
<@U0D6EPESC>: taking a look at the presentation draft now
<@U177W7XH8>: I can't make it earlier that day, but skype or hangouts is always a go go :slightly_smiling_face:
Carmen and I will meet Wednesday  at 17, so maybe earlier that day's an option. Or Skype... whatever works for the both of you
<@U177W7XH8> can you schedule one of your famous interviews with <@U1BLTT51T>
oh...and hello everybody!! ^_^

<@U0D6EPESC> wow...thank you so much Jan Hein for the super nice words. I'm not sure I deserve all of them :stuck_out_tongue: 
<@U177W7XH8> that is very sweet of you. Looking forward to meeting you too ^_^
Hi carmen, welcome in our slack! :grin: Would be very cool if you are joining the team! Heard alot about you, looking forward to working together :wink:
<@U1BLTT51T>: anything to add / correct?

<!channel>: hi all. For those of you who don't know her already. Carmen just joined our slack. Carmen is one of the best developers I know and awesome overall. Carmen has joined to get to know us a bit better and !ay have some questions. Help her out and make her feel welcome!
<@U1BLTT51T> has joined the channel
I checked my phone, but I only have pictures of the whiteboard in various stages... Anyone else?
I remember JH took a few at the end,not sure if it was with your phone though, can you check?
<!channel>: I recall we made a group picture at the team day... but nobody seems to have it. Anyone know who took this picture (or if it's just my imagination)?

<@U0CRWKV2T>: <!channel>: here's the first draft of my presentation:

<http://offcourse.github.io/presentation-moonconf/>
<https://github.com/yeehaa123/presentation-moonconf/blob/master/slides.md>

All comments are welcome!

text: Cool!
Okay, perfect, I’m going to look through it and then look at the styling with Donald tomorrow
<@U0HU55QSD>:  I use this branch of reveal for the moment: <https://github.com/zharley/present>
(i see md’s but no parsing of them)
<@U0D6EPESC> which presentation platform / tool did you have in mind?
some basic styling would be great!
<@U17C0L2VA>: <@U0HU55QSD> Here is the link to my presentation: <https://github.com/yeehaa123/presentation-moonconf>

text: Guys can you all link to <http://offcourse.io/> in your personal twitter profile?
This is our linkedin page: <https://www.linkedin.com/company/offcourse_>
Me too now, really.
Everyone, I'm off now. Speak at 5!
<!channel>: love all the activity here. Great work y'all! Going back to bed for a few hours. (It's 4:45 am) Talk to you afterwards!
Welcome! Good to have you on board, hope we can meet soon!
Ah look at that, I'm in this channel as well! I feel so welcome :smile:
<@U0ARRNM3R>: <@U19QXDFQD> for completeness sake :wink: <https://offcourse.slack.com/archives/tagline/p1464085573000020>

attachments.fallback: [May 24th, 2016 3:26 AM] yeehaa: <@U19QXDFQD>: welcome! How are you doing Amber? Great to have you here!
attachments.text: <@U19QXDFQD>: welcome! How are you doing Amber? Great to have you here!

text: Everyone <!channel>, <@U19QXDFQD> has been in the Slack for a week now, so it's about time that I introduce her! She's a freelance writer, editor and translator and she's been contributing to the text for our <#C19AK3WBY>. She's fast and has good and strong opinions about how to write proper texts, so please welcome her to the team :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U0D6EPESC>: thanks, I’ll put this on the list

<!channel>: like I announced. Don't know if I can join the call tomorrow. If not, Donald will moderate. The following three points need to be discussed in any case:

1. Frontsite 
2. Event June 1st
3. Social Media

Maybe talk to you all tomorrow. Otherwise, soon
Hi <@U19SW5FAR>, just spoke to yeehaa. Heard a lot of good things about you. Looking forward to meet you in real life and work together.
<@U177W7XH8>: I think we should definitely consider it. Can you guys discuss it during the meeting Tuesday?
That looks amazing. Should we apply?
<https://www.linkedin.com/hp/update/6139338232736858112>
<!channel>: FYI RJ will be at my studio this monday to work on the website. Keep you updated then. Enjoy the weekend!
<@U0D6EPESC> I'll commit to that

<!channel> I don't care who's fault this is. But this needs to be resolved asap. <@U0HU55QSD> I agree with your strategy, but have two additions 1) This happens before Tuesday 2) The site is in good shape  (meaning I don't feel embarrassed sending it to external parties). Can we all commit to this?

There is no point in either defending or yielding to these statements right now. Donald will send me his comments on the design soon and I'll implements them directly after and put the site online. Unless there is a better idea that how I'm going to continue.

<@U0HU55QSD>, you gave me that impression too.  <!channel>, I sent the new content changes we agreed upon to <@U17C0L2VA> for review the previous week. The front site was supposed to be finished on Tuesday, with a delay to Friday (so yesterday), given that <@U0D6EPESC> is leaving for the US this Monday. To be honest, I'm disappointed that it takes this long to have a functioning front site.
What have you done since we last discussed it?
Oh, I also thought you meant working on our website all day..

<@U0HU55QSD>: <@U17C0L2VA> We all agreed on the Friday deadline for the site. We are urgently waiting for the updated site for weeks now. I don't think it's okay to delay it without discussing this with the team.

Sorry for the confusion there, we worked on a lot of stuff concerning Screen Invaders, which took longer than we expected.  Donald and I agreed he would give me some direction where to take this site later on.
The first one, but you guys were supposed to put the updated one online yesterday. So, if this the current state. What exactly did you work on yesterday?
You’re talking about this one updated with a little bit hierarchy and flair, but no big changes, right? Or are you talking about the one I showed in a very raw form Tuesday?
no, this is a step back from the current site. We need the one with the design updates
I know, that the part of what I suggested: I can put this one online until I receive design direction
I know, but I don't see any updates
True, we decided to revert to that one, give it a little bit of design updates, and then put it online right
But that one is still the same as last week...
<http://user-staging.offcourse.io|user-staging.offcourse.io>
Don't know how it looks like now... where can I see it.
(That done with a click of a button)
<@U0D6EPESC> I can trow this one online right now until I receive design direction, would that help?
<@U0HU55QSD>: just make sure, it's online by Tuesday the latest. I'm holding off referring some interesting leads to our site (i.e. potential partners). We need it a.s.a.p.
<@U0HU55QSD>: Great job!
The potential for the launching partners sounds great by the way, that really what we need to speed things up!

<@U0D6EPESC>: Donald and I have been working together all day yesterday, fixing and making stuff. We’ve made it quite late, but we didn’t get to do all the things we wanted to do. At the end of the day we agreed that Donald would formulate some directions for me in a PSD / Screenshot / chat and and as soon as I receive those I’ll quickly implement them and throw the site online.
way to go guys, you’re all doing awesome work!! ^___^

<!channel>: great news! The people that I've been talking to want to be a launching partner. Nothing is set in stone, but they intend to pay for one or two developers for three to six months to helps us finish the platform. They will send us more details next week, and I'll keep you posted. 

Things are looking good! We are being courted quite heavily by other parties too. Now let's keep the momentum going!
